in_ports.description: 0: coast motor; < 0: rotate counterclockwise; > 0 rotate clockwise. Non-zero value indicates throttle percentage.
in_ports.name: IN

out_ports.description: Connect to OUT[0] through OUT[3] to L293D 1A, 2A, 3A, and 4A respectively.
out_ports.name: OUT[4]

out_ports.description: Throttle output, in percentage (compatible with PWM node type's DUTY_CYCLE_PERCENT input port).
out_ports.name: THROTTLE

members.description: Invert clockwise/counter-clockwise commands. Useful for skid-steering robots.
members.name: inverted
